description:
With Ten powerless after losing his horn, Ataru decides to take his revenge on the little guy! In the meantime, Ran seems to have swiped the horn for her own nefarious purposes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Quand la belle change de camp
Wai no Tsuno o Kaeshite Kure!
わいのツノを 返してくれ!
